languages.text: "Простите, что вмешиваюсь, Лорд-капитан. Однако я считаю своим долгом напомнить, что Навис Нобилите — крайне уважаемые граждане Империума и путеводители Человечества сквозь варп. Могущество знатного навигаторского Дома сродни могуществу вашего протектората. Помочь им в трудную минуту — значит обзавестись влиятельным союзником".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, что вмешиваюсь, Лорд-капитан. Однако я считаю своим долгом напомнить, что Навис Нобилите — крайне уважаемые граждане Империума и путеводители Человечества сквозь варп. Могущество знатного навигаторского дома сродни могуществу вашей торговой империи. Помочь им в трудную минуту — значит обзавестись влиятельным союзником".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."
languages.original_text: "Простите, что вмешиваюсь, Лорд-капитан. Однако я считаю своим долгом напомнить, что Навис Нобилите — крайне уважаемые граждане Империума и путеводители Человечества сквозь варп. Могущество знатного навигаторского Дома сродни могуществу вашего протектората. Помочь им в трудную минуту — значит обзавестись влиятельным союзником".

The power of a highborn Navigator house is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez mon impudence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais il est de mon devoir de vous rappeler que les représentants de la Navis Nobilite sont des citoyens de l'Imperium de tout premier rang, et rien de moins que les guides de l'humanité à travers les méandres du Warp. Cette noble maison de navigateurs jouit d'un pouvoir et d'un statut comparables à deux de votre protectorat. Leur porter secours pourrait nous valoir un allié influent. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez mon impudence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais il est de mon devoir de vous rappeler que les représentants de la Navis Nobilite sont des citoyens de l'Imperium de tout premier rang, et rien de moins que les guides de l'humanité à travers les méandres du Warp. Cette noble maison de navigateurs jouit d'un pouvoir et d'un statut comparables à deux de votre protectorat. Leur porter secours pourrait nous valoir un allié influent. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch ich sehe es als meine Pflicht an, Euch darüber in Kenntnis zu setzen, dass die Navis Nobilite hochangesehene Bürger des Imperiums sind. Sie führen die Menschheit durch den Warp. Ein hochwohlgeborenes Navigatorenhaus genießt ebenso viel Macht und Status wie Euer Protektorat. Wenn wir ihnen in ihrer Stunde der Not helfen, gewinnen wir einen einflussreichen Verbündeten."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch ich sehe es als meine Pflicht an, Euch darüber in Kenntnis zu setzen, dass die Navis Nobilite hochangesehene Bürger des Imperiums sind. Sie führen die Menschheit durch den Warp. Ein hochwohlgeborenes Navigatorenhaus genießt ebenso viel Macht und Status wie Euer Protektorat. Wenn wir ihnen in ihrer Stunde der Not helfen, gewinnen wir einen einflussreichen Verbündeten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Disculpe que me entrometa, Lord Capitán, pero creo que es mi deber recordarle que los miembros de la Navis Nobilite son ciudadanos respetados del Imperium, pues ayudan a la Humanidad a atravesar la disformidad. El poder y el estado de una casa noble de navegantes es similar al de su protectorado. Ayudarlos en estos momentos de necesidad le garantizará unos aliados influyentes».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe que me entrometa, Lord Capitán, pero creo que es mi deber recordarle que los miembros de la Navis Nobilite son ciudadanos respetados del Imperium, pues ayudan a la Humanidad a atravesar la disformidad. El poder y el estado de una casa noble de navegantes es similar al de su protectorado. Ayudarlos en estos momentos de necesidad le garantizará unos aliados influyentes».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，请原谅我的冒昧，但我认为我有责任提醒您——导航宗族是帝国备受尊敬的公民，是人类穿越亚空间的向导。导航宗族地位尊贵，家族权力几乎与您的王朝相差无几。若是能在他们需要帮助的时候伸出援手，就相当于获得了一位颇具影响力的盟友。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请原谅我的冒昧，但我认为我有责任提醒您——导航宗族是帝国备受尊敬的公民，是人类穿越亚空间的向导。导航宗族地位尊贵，家族权力几乎与您的王朝相差无几。若是能在他们需要帮助的时候伸出援手，就相当于获得了一位颇具影响力的盟友。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「割って入ってすみません、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、この件を改めて話すのが私の義務かと。航宙貴族は非常に尊敬を集める帝国民であり、人類を歪みを通って導く存在です。ハイボーンの航宙士一族の力と地位は、陛下の保護国と同等。彼らの苦境に手を差し伸べれば、影響力のある盟友を得ることができるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."

traits.locale_text: 「割って入ってすみません、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、この件を改めて話すのが私の義務かと。航宙貴族は非常に尊敬を集める帝国民であり、人類を歪みを通って導く存在です。ハイボーンの航宙士一族の力と地位は、陛下の保護国と同等。彼らの苦境に手を差し伸べれば、影響力のある盟友を得ることができるでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Müdahil olduğum için lütfen affedin Lord Kaptan ancak Navis Nobilite'nin büyük saygı duyulan İmparatorluk yurttaşları olduklarını ve İnsanlığın öteboyuttaki kılavuzları konumunda bulunduklarını hatırlatmak vazifemdir. Soylu bir Rotacı Hanesi'nin gücü ve statüsü, sizin protektoranıza denktir. Onlara bu ihtiyaç anında destek olmak, size nüfuz sahibi bir müttefik kazandıracaktır."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for intruding, Lord Captain, but I feel it is my duty to remind you that the Navis Nobilite are highly respected citizens of the Imperium, Humanity's guides through the warp. The power and status of a highborn Navigator House is akin to that of your protectorate. To aid them in their hour of need is to acquire an influential ally."
